content.title: Scheme Of Post Matric Scholarships To The Students Belonging To Scheduled Tribes For Studies In India
content.details: The scheme provides scholarships to students belonging to Scheduled Tribes for pursuing post-matriculation courses in India. It includes various allowances and provisions for students with disabilities.
content.application_process: Online application through the official website.

faqs.question: What is the value of the scholarship?
faqs.answer: The scholarship includes maintenance allowance, reimbursement of fees, and additional provisions for students with disabilities.

faqs.question: Are there any provisions for students with disabilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, there are additional allowances for blind scholars, transport allowance, escort allowance, and special pay for helpers.

faqs.question: How is the maintenance allowance structured?
faqs.answer: The maintenance allowance varies by group and course type, with specific rates for hostellers and day scholars.
